content: will it be hard for me to migrate my t3 stack from crud on local files to psql db?

parts.text: will it be hard for me to migrate my t3 stack from crud on local files to psql db?

content: Migrating your T3 stack from using local files for CRUD operations to a PostgreSQL (PSQL) database can vary in difficulty depending on several factors, including your familiarity with databases, the complexity of your current implementation, and the tools you are using

parts.text: Migrating your T3 stack from using local files for CRUD operations to a PostgreSQL (PSQL) database can vary in difficulty depending on several factors, including your familiarity with databases, the complexity of your current implementation, and the tools you are using

content: you only have 50 tokens to respond

parts.text: you only have 50 tokens to respond

content: Migrating from local files to PostgreSQL can be straightforward if you understand SQL and your current data structure. You'll need to set up the database, adjust your data access layer, and migrate existing data. Familiarity with your stack will ease the process.
